articles.title: 850 Paleolithic artifacts discovered with the naked eye in a desert - Earth.com
articles.summary: 850 Paleolithic artifacts discovered with the naked eye in a desert Over 850 stone artifacts from the Paleolithic period were recently spotted on the surface of a desert region in Iraq. These objects appear to trace back as far as 1. 5 million years, shining a spotlight on an era when early humans were shaping simple tools for daily tasks.
